languages.text: "Если мы идем по стопам святой, Богу-Императору угодно, чтобы мы прошли этот путь до конца".
"If we are indeed following in the footsteps of a saint, the God-Emperor would be pleased if we saw this path through to the end."
languages.original_text: "Если мы идем по стопам святой, Богу-Императору угодно, чтобы мы прошли этот путь до конца".

traits.locale_text: "If we are indeed following in the footsteps of a saint, the God-Emperor would be pleased if we walked this path to the end."
"If we are indeed following in the footsteps of a saint, the God-Emperor would be pleased if we walked this path to the end."
"If we are indeed following in the footsteps of a saint, the God-Emperor would be pleased if we saw this path through to the end."
"If we are indeed following in the footsteps of a saint, the God-Emperor would be pleased if we saw this path through to the end."
"If we are indeed following in the footsteps of a saint, the God-Emperor would be pleased if we saw this path through to the end."
"If we are indeed following in the footsteps of a saint, the God-Emperor would be pleased if we saw this path through to the end."

languages.text: « Si nous suivons les traces d'un saint, l'Empereur-Dieu serait heureux que nous allions jusqu'au bout. »
languages.original_text: "If we are indeed following in the footsteps of a saint, the God-Emperor would be pleased if we saw this path through to the end."

traits.locale_text: « Si nous suivons les traces d'un saint, l'Empereur-Dieu serait heureux que nous allions jusqu'au bout. »

languages.text: «Si de verdad seguimos los pasos de una santa, al Dios Emperador le agradará que recorramos el camino hasta el final».
languages.original_text: "If we are indeed following in the footsteps of a saint, the God-Emperor would be pleased if we saw this path through to the end."

traits.locale_text: «Si de verdad seguimos los pasos de una santa, al Dios Emperador le agradará que recorramos el camino hasta el final».

languages.text: 「私達が本当に聖人の足跡をたどっているのなら、この道を最後まで見届けたとき、神帝陛下もお喜びになるはずだ」
languages.original_text: "If we are indeed following in the footsteps of a saint, the God-Emperor would be pleased if we saw this path through to the end."

traits.locale_text: 「私達が本当に聖人の足跡をたどっているのなら、この道を最後まで見届けたとき、神帝陛下もお喜びになるはずだ」

languages.text: “如果我们真的是在追随圣人的足迹，那我们就把这条路走到底吧，神皇一定会满意的。”
languages.original_text: "If we are indeed following in the footsteps of a saint, the God-Emperor would be pleased if we saw this path through to the end."

traits.locale_text: “如果我们真的是在追随圣人的足迹，那我们就把这条路走到底吧，神皇一定会满意的。”

languages.text: "Falls wir tatsächlich in die Fußstapfen eines Heiligen treten, wäre der Gottimperator erfreut, wenn wir diesen Weg bis zum Ende gingen."
languages.original_text: "If we are indeed following in the footsteps of a saint, the God-Emperor would be pleased if we saw this path through to the end."

traits.locale_text: "Falls wir tatsächlich in die Fußstapfen eines Heiligen treten, wäre der Gottimperator erfreut, wenn wir diesen Weg bis zum Ende gingen."

languages.text: "Gerçekten bir azizin izinden gidiyorsak Tanrı İmparator, bu yolun sonunu görmemizden memnun olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "If we are indeed following in the footsteps of a saint, the God-Emperor would be pleased if we saw this path through to the end."
